site_name: Land at 43-45 and 39-41 Notting Hill Gate and 161-237 (odd) Kensington Church Street, LONDON, W11 3LQ
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Condition 48 (Construction Environmental Management Plan (CEMP)) of planning permission PP/23/03534 (Partial retention, refurbishment and extension of the Newcombe House tower for continued office use (Class E(g)(i)), the full demolition of the rest of the site comprising existing retail (Class E) and housing (Class C3) uses and surface level car park, and redevelopment to provide retail use (Class E) at ground floor and office use (Class E(g)(i)) at the upper floors, housing (Class C3) and a medical centre (Class E (e)), in new buildings ranging from 6 - 15 storeys with double basement, public realm works and other ancillary works (MAJOR DEVELOPMENT))
